coordinates.w: Width of the sprite or element
coordinates.h: Height of the sprite or element

sprite.svgNotSupported: SVG format is not supported by DragonRuby
sprite.tipNotFound: Check if the file path is correct or if the file has been moved/deleted.
sprite.tipUnsupported: DragonRSense currently supports PNG and JPEG. The file may be corrupted.
sprite.tipSvg: DragonRuby requires PNG or JPEG. Convert your SVG to PNG first.

commands.helloMessage: DragonRSense is active! Where code stops being numbers and becomes meaning.
